SEARCH
Package cycling

Class Race

java.lang.Object
cycling.Race
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Race extends Object implements Serializable
Race stores information regarding a race such as stages and the properties associated with it
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Race

      public Race()
      Constructs an empty temporary race

    • Race

      public Race(String name, String description, Map<Integer,Race> races)
      Constructs a new race with the provided parameters. It will also generate a unique random ID for the race.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the race
      description - The description of the race
      races - All of the races currently in CyclingPortalImpl

    • addStage

      public int addStage(String name, String description, double length, LocalDateTime startTime, StageType type)
      Creates a new stage with the given parameters. Also generates a unique id for this stage
      Parameters:
      name - The name of this stage
      description - The description of this stage
      length - The distance of this stage
      startTime - The time this stage starts
      type - The type of race StageType.FLAT, StageType.MEDIUM_MOUNTAIN, StageType.HIGH_MOUNTAIN or StageType.TT
      Returns:
      The unique ID of this created stage

    • getOrderedStageIds

      public ArrayList<Integer> getOrderedStageIds()
      Gets the ordered stage ids of a race
      Returns:
      The ordered stage ids of this race

    • getRiders

      public ArrayList<Rider> getRiders()
      Gets the riders in a race
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of rider ids of those competing in this race

    • getStages

      public Map<Integer,Stage> getStages()
      Gets the stages in a race
      Returns:
      A map containing the stage ids and stage objects of those in this race

    • findStage

      public static Stage findStage(int stageId, Map<Integer,Race> races)
      Finds a stage using a stageId
      Parameters:
      stageId - The unique id representing the stage being searched for
      races - The list of all races in CyclingPortalImpl
      Returns:
      The stage that stageId belongs to

    • findStagesRace

      public static Race findStagesRace(int stageId, Map<Integer,Race> races)
      Finds the race a stage is apart of from the stage's id
      Parameters:
      stageId - The unique id representing the stage inside the race being searched for
      races - The list of all races in CyclingPortalImpl
      Returns:
      The race that the stage represented by stageId belongs to

    • getLength

      public double getLength()
      Calculates the length of a race from the length of all its stages
      Returns:
      The length of this race

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Writes a formatted string containing information about a race
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      A formatted string containing the id, name, description, number of stages and length of this race
